website_summaries.verdict: A natural but innovative lotion that lifts and moisturizes the face all day.
pros: Smooths out skin and provides a subtle lift
Great for dry or aging skin
You can use every day, you don't need to apply much, and the fragrance isn't overwhelming
cons: Overall, it's a bit pricey for the final results
Many users don't see the added benefit of its flagship bee venom

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and SUPER yummy feeling smells faintly of whipped honey
customer_reviews.text: It’s thick and feels yummy and let’s face it ...... you aren’t going to get a good deal for cream for cheap. Mature ladies know what I’m talking about. We need very high quality!! This seller can be trusted. Some scoop out cream and put filler or sell you stale stuff. This is quality. I’m an expert at seeing immediately if someone is a fraud. This is yummy bee venom all the way! 🥰😍
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Compliments ....
customer_reviews.text: I originally found this product in a retail-store, asked for sample and used it at home for a week. I liked the way my skin felt but most of all I received compliments from others and also noticed my complexion looked better in pictures. So when I purchased the product, I didn't go back to the retail store because they wanted $50 more than Amazon for the same product, same size. Will continue to buy this product from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: I've recommended Rodial Bee Venom to my closet friends
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how this cream works, but it does! I've reordered twice and it has been worth it's price.My face and neck look smooth and plump. My neck doesn't have that loose crepey Texture. I've recommended Rodial Bee Venom to my closet friends..
customer_reviews.author: Georgette Palassis

customer_reviews.title: Good Cream
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a miracle cream! LOL! It's still a great cream. My friend said she noticed my face looked softer. I don't notice any difference. But it's not a bad cream just not bad ass! LOL!
customer_reviews.author: kristie buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Really just an extremely overpriced moisturizer. I have $25. products that go on just as smooth but work better. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: abelha727

customer_reviews.title: these are great.
customer_reviews.text: Changed to these products after chemo and radiation, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Payne

customer_reviews.title: Bee Venom from Rodial Works
customer_reviews.text: Like the creaminess and that it sinks in almost immediately. Leaves no residue. Do not like the scent! Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Jayal

customer_reviews.title: Odd smell
customer_reviews.text: The one thing that is odd is that it smells a little moldy. Not sure why this is and I do believe it’s genuine. I’ve considered returning it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did see that much of a change after 2 weeks. There are cheaper products that do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Product
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best moisturizer that I have ever tried for helping my sensitive and very dry skin!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the texture of this product.It goes on smoothly and helps retain skin moisture. I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Good Moisterizer - Unsure if the bee venom component actully adds any benefit so far
customer_reviews.text: It's a good, thick moisterizer which doesn't seem to cause any pore-clogging. As far as the bee venom having any beneficial effect, it may be too early to tell. When this runs out, I may try a bee venom serum, with a stronger concentration,and pair that with a regular moisterizer. I think any benefit of the bee venom component should be more noticeable (or not) with that regimen.
customer_reviews.author: R. Clausen

customer_reviews.title: The bee and I
customer_reviews.text: I love this product...it Is a truly great moisturizer. I recommend Rodial bee venom cream to everybody who is worried about dry, aging skin.
customer_reviews.author: squirrel

customer_reviews.title: My Botox ‘dealer’ is disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this line since May... last time I saw my plastic surgeon for Botox was in March. Saw her two weeks ago and she commented that my forehead lines were noticeably improved and she had to give me less Botox units!!! Fragrance is nice and it makes my skin luminous and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Becca Brewski

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get any better!
customer_reviews.text: At 57 years of age, I have tried just about every cream on the planet! When I began using Bee Venom, I couldn't stop touching my face! Incredibly soft and finally hydrated! Don't miss out on this great price, too!!! I paid much, much more for this at a department store.
customer_reviews.author: Marciann14

product_meta.title: Rodial Bee Venom Moisturiser, 1.7 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Rodial bee venom moisturizer is a revolutionary formula that instantly renews and revitalizes skin for naturally healthy and younger looking skin. The formula features honey bee venom which works synergistically with an exclusive complex of plant stem cells to dramatically improve skin tone and elasticity. Cyclopeptide-5 and juvinity? Help refine and resuRFace, plump and smooth out fine lines and wrinkles, and even skin tone. Hyaluronic acid provides intense hydration for long-lasting moisture and a supple, radiant complexion. Rodial bee venom moisturizer is suitable for all skin types.

BRAND STORY
The ultimate skincare collection. Pairing world-class anti-ageing ingredients with ground-breaking innovation Rodial products are high-performance skincare essentials targeting a range of skin concerns.

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
